添.definition: to add; to increase; to replenish

添丁.definition: to add a son to the family

添亂.definition: (coll.) to cause trouble for sb; to inconvenience

添堵.definition: to make people feel even more stressed or annoyed (coll.); to make traffic congestion even worse

添油加醋.definition: lit. to add oil and vinegar (idiom); fig. to embellish; to exaggerate (a story, a narration etc)

添磚加瓦.definition: lit. contribute bricks and tiles for a building (idiom); fig. to do one's bit to help

添置.definition: to buy; to acquire; to add to one's possessions

添麻煩.definition: to cause trouble for sb; to inconvenience
